title: Axway and Forrester Present Key Strategies for Banking in the New Digital Economy
text:
Experts Explore How Financial Institutions Can Use Digital Capabilities to Remain Competitive
Phoenix, AZ (PRWEB) October 02, 2015
In the new digital economy, banking has a crucial role to play as speed, convenience, and integration across online, mobile and partner channels shift from perks to prerequisites when competing for customer business. Axway (Euronext: AXW.PA), a market leader in governing the flow of data, today announced an upcoming webinar with featured guest Jost Hopperman, Principal Analyst of Application Development and Delivery at Forrester Research .
The complimentary webinar will be presented by American Banker , the leading information resource serving the banking and financial services community. Hopperman will highlight survey results covering medium-term trends in financial services and summarize key elements from Forrester’s view of banking of the future and related target state architectures. Axway’s Nitin Thukral, Digital Solutions for Financial Services, will provide technological insights drawn from deep experience in serving financial services organizations.
Topics that will be discussed include:
 The current state of transformation in the financial services industry The business technologies that are driving innovation High-level Forrester findings on ubiquitous banking and the mobile mindshift Requirements for a target state architecture and the crucial role of APIs A real-world framework for using digitalization to drive operational efficiency, monetize new services, and achieve competitive advantages To register the webinar, click here .
Discover Axway’s digitalization enablement offering for the financial services industry here .
